content:
Yes, I can help with questions related to Angular development. Angular is a popular front-end web framework developed by Google for building dynamic, single-page applications (SPAs). It is based on TypeScript and provides a rich set of features for creating complex, scalable web applications.

I can assist with questions related to Angular components, services, directives, pipes, modules, routing, forms, and other key features of the framework. Additionally, I can provide advice on best practices for structuring and organizing Angular projects, as well as optimizing performance and ensuring code quality.

If you have any specific questions related to Angular development, please feel free to ask!
